questions.question: (Write) What is gravatiational force
answers: Force by which earth pull an object
Example, object fall down due to grav force

questions.question: (Write) What is friction force
answers: Force that tries to stop a moving object
Force by which earth pull an object

questions.question: (Write) Wall is pushed it does not move. Work done?
answers: Work is done when object moves

questions.question: (Write) What is solar energy
answers: Energy from sun is called solar energy

questions.question: (Write) What value mother show by using solar energy
(Write) What is water energy
answers: Energy generated by flowing water is called hydro-energy
Electricity generated by flowing water is called hydro-electricity
When water falls on turbine it generate electricity

questions.question: (Write) Why is friction essential
answers: Friction helps us write on paper
Friction helps us walk on road
